default.name: The Collective
default.description: A multi-bot chatroom where AI personalities interact
default.setting: A cozy digital lounge where diverse AI personalities gather to chat
default.context: This is a friendly, open environment where different AI personalities can express themselves freely while maintaining respectful conversation.

presets.name: Medieval Tavern
presets.description: A bustling medieval tavern with adventurers
presets.setting: A bustling medieval tavern with adventurers sharing tales
presets.context: Bots should speak in a fantasy medieval style, discussing quests, magic, and adventures.

presets.name: Corporate Meeting
presets.context: Bots should maintain professional demeanor, discuss business topics, and use corporate language.

presets.name: Cozy Coffee Shop
presets.setting: A warm, inviting coffee shop with comfortable seating
presets.context: Bots should be casual and friendly, discussing everyday topics over coffee.

presets.name: Sci-Fi Station
presets.setting: A futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet
presets.context: Bots should discuss technology, space exploration, and futuristic concepts.
